example.text: Protecting a Woman's Right to Choose It's no surprise that the first order of business for the new Republican majority was an attack on women and their fundamental rights. Sadly, overturning Roe v. Wade was only the beginning.

I look forward to the work ahead and the opportunity to partner with my colleagues on both sides of the aisle to protect our democracy and build a stronger future for every American. Please know my office is always here to help.

The expanded Child Tax Credit was transformative for our community, helping to lift 8,200 children out of poverty and give our families an average benefit of just under $3,000 . For many families, this tax credit meant the difference between putting food on the table or not, paying their utility bills or not, and having the flexibility to return to work or not.

Protecting Our National Security Congressman George Santos has demonstrated a clear pattern of lies, fraud, and deceit-all of which constitute a severe threat to our national security. Following his election to Congress, it was revealed Santos had been fabricating falsehoods covering the entirety of his education and career.

We have already seen how this benefit has a profound impact on our community, and we need to keep that progress going. As we close in on the end of the year, I'll be working with my partners in government and fighting to extend the Child Tax Credit in our appropriations package.

On Thursday, I voted to pass the National Defense Authorization Act (NDAA) for Fiscal Year 2023. This year's NDAA, which I helped create as a member of the House Armed Services Committee, contains key provisions to bolster our ability to compete with countries like China, ensure we are prepared to protect global security and peace, and make vital investments in our military families.

I'm proud to have led the debate on the House floor in support of this bipartisan legislation that makes good on our promise to support the courageous men and women of our Armed Forces. Read: add the NDAA Release Fighting for Our Families During the height of the COVID pandemic, my colleagues and I passed the American Rescue Plan , an historic investment which strengthened monthly Child Tax Credit payments for qualifying families.
